channel.title: HELP! Need help with starter screen!
channel.description:
u know how when u start a server it comes up with that screen that says something like- "welcome to _____ scape!!!" then all that crap... how do u change that and how do u change the npcs that say like- BLANK is owner... blah blah blah BLANK is on?
TYVM for help!!

item.title: HELP! Need help with starter screen!
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

Go to client.java search what it says when you log in.

for example,

"Welcome to HellzEnd!"

You would change whats in the quotations to what you want it to say.

To change what npc’s say search what they already say

Example,

"Owner_ is offline!"

Change what’s in the quotations to what you want it to say plus your user when you log in.

Hope this Will help you out :D.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! Need help with starter screen!
